name: freak-show-124
text:
HEADER
Podcast: freak-show
Episode: 124
Episodetitle: Endlich mal normale Leute
Starttime: Wed Jan 15 2014 20:15:00 GMT+0100 (CET)
relativeTimestamps: no
Endtime: Wed Jan 15 2014 20:15:00 GMT+0100 (CET)
Podcaster: Tim Pritlove (@timpritlove), Denis Ahrens (@denis2342), hukl (@hukl), roddi (@roddi), Clemens (@csch)
Shownoter: @mrmoe <https://alpha.app.net/moe>, vale <https://alpha.app.net/vale>, @NGC_Ollie, nofoo <https://alpha.app.net/nofoo>, anZen <https://alpha.app.net/anzen>
Chat: <http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=freakshow>
Stream: <http://streams.xenim.de/metaebene.mp3>
Webseite: <http://freakshow.fm>
Episodepage: <http://freakshow.fm/fs124-endlich-mal-normale-leute
Titelvorschläge: 
"Popp-Protokoll"
"Dark-Rohr"
"Strick-Guerilla"
"Bei 200°C in den Ofen"
Lunations Mondphasen GSM

/HEADER
